expect.label: Disable serialization of multiple same query string keys as arrays

mapper.fulfillmentText: Ok, thank you. That's all what I need. I will prepare the document and send it to the team of doctor {{8.queryResult.parameters.physicianName}}. They will check it and send it further or back to you (depending of the document). Have a nice day and best regards, MiDAS Team
